text: Rated A for Awesome is a Canadian animated television series. It was created by Asaph Fipke. It premiered on YTV on September 3, 2011. The series ended on February 25, 2012. It also aired on Disney XD in United States. It was produced by the Canadian animation studio Nerd Corps Entertainment. The series follows four 12-year-old kids and a pet monkey as they attempt to make the world awesome by awesomizing everything boring, including the world's dullest teacher and detention. title: Rated A for Awesome
